ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: It is indeed an evil lodging and abode';
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: It is indeed an evil halt and an evil abode;"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: it is an evil abode and an evil resting place":
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: It is a terrible abode and an evil station,"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed it is a most wretched abode.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Evil indeed it is as an abode and as a place to rest in.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely it is an evil abode and (evil) place to stay.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: evil it is as a lodging-place and an abode';
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! it is wretched as abode and station;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Indeed, it is an evil abode and evil dwelling-place."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily ill it is as an abode and as a station.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed it is an evil station and abode.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Evil indeed is it as an abode, and as a place to rest in";
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Evil indeed it (Hell) is as an abode and as a place to dwell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: it is an evil settling, and an evil residence'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: It is indeed a miserable residence and destination.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, it is evil as a settlement and residence."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [25:66] It is truly a wretched abode and residence!’, in other words, [it is truly wretched] as a place in which to abide and reside.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! it is wretched as abode and station) dwelling;
